PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-17172012-12-13,  ,  NRCAN,  CNSC,  , 
ActNuclear Safety and Control Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Class l Nuclear Facilities Regulations and the Uranium Mines and Mills Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the CLASS I NUCLEAR FACILITIES REGULATIONS AND THE URANIUM MINES AND MILLS REGULATIONS in order to establish timelines on the Commission for reviews of licence applications to prepare site for new Class I nuclear facilities, as defined in the Class I Nuclear Facilities Regulations, and licence applications to prepare site for and construct new uranium mines or mills, as defined in the Uranium Mines and Mills Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0288 Publication Date: 2013-01-02
AttachmentsAttachment
